text: Khandaker Nurul Islam is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Faridpur-2. ==Career== Islam was elected to parliament from Faridpur-2 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1973. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Khandaker Nurul Islam
